      • createPathIfNotExists

        java.nio.file.Path createPathIfNotExists(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Description copied from interface: FileManager
        Evaluates whether or not a given Path reference directory exists. If it exists nothing is done. If it did not yet exist, the directory is created.
        Specified by:
        createPathIfNotExists in interface FileManager
        Parameters:
        path - The Path to evaluate
        Returns:
        The created Path

      • getModDir

        @NotNull
default @NotNull Exceptional<java.nio.file.Path> getModDir()
        Description copied from interface: FileManager
        Get the base mods directory of a platform file system. The exact location is decided by the top-level implementation of this type.

        Depending on the platform this directory may not be present.

        Specified by:
        getModDir in interface FileManager
        Returns:
        A Exceptional object containing either a Path reference to a directory, or nothing.
